content.detailedDescription: I was delivering newspapers at 5:03 this morning (march 27th 2012) when i noticed a white ball of light surrounded by a neon whit aura traveling toward the earth at a very slow rate of speed. it was literally leaving a trail of light behind it. i thought perhaps a falling satellite until it did something extraordinary. it changed directions. not just once but multiple times. it was not uniform at all however but very erratic. it fell for a while and then shot back upward then beck down at another angle leaving a trail of white light behind it that did not dissipate for about forty minutes. while speeding home to tell some friends i noticed a second one to the left of the original making a lightning shaped pattern through the sky. it scared me so i rushed home. i have benn delivering papered for two years now and have seen just about everything you can see in the night sky. but never have i seen anything like this. it was amazing yet terrifying at the same time. there were reports of this being seen the part few nights over new jersey but now pa. i couldn't get a picture of it. the glow was too dim by the time i got home for the camera to pick it up? anyone out there seen this? i would love to hear from you. my friend matt saw the remains of the glow when i took him outside to see it.
content.summary: Bright orbs leaving twin trails of neon white light

content.detailedDescription:
my house is located on a 2 acre property out in the country, which makes star gazing easy because there is no light polution coming from nearby cities and towns. 
  i occasionally go outside at night to smoke a cigarette and/or relieve myself, i do the latter because it is convenient and so i don't wake up my wife or kids by flushing our noisy toilet as they go to bed earlier than i do. this also gives me a chance view the night sky which i enjoy very much.
  on this particular night in late january 2012, there was no moon visible that i can remember so it was very dark out and the stars shown brightly. about 12:30am i walked out to the west side of my shop which is about the size of a 2 car garage 50feet from my house and proceeded to do my business. as i stood there relieving myself i looked up at the stars as i often do. it was then when something drew my eye and i looked directly above my head... and saw a perfectly circular soft white light about 500 feet straight above me. it wasn't so much a projecting light, meaning it didn't give off a glare or aura or glow or beam. it looked more like a room that was brightly lit up from the inside and the circle shape i saw was an opening leading to this room. the circle shaped opening looked to be about 20 to 30 feet in diameter, and i could see no other shapes inside or the near outside of this light.
  about 1 second after i looked up at this light and noticed it, a single door or cover with a leading edge the same circumference as the circle began to close over the light from the direction of north to south... and soon the light was totally covered. this door or cover took 3-4 seconds to completly close over the light.
  i stood there for a moment and tried to make out the shape of a craft that would house this light, but it was too dark to see any exterior shape of any kind. i listend for any noise that would go along with what i just saw, but i heard nothing. 
  the fact that this door or cover closed the very moment after i looked up at the light instantly made me very nervous. it seemed to me that whatever this light was it was reacting to me making eye contact with it. it gave me the feeling that this light would have continued uncovered had i not noticed it... like i was being watched and i caught someone watching me. 
  it was then i said out loud to myself and in a way to whomever might be able to hear me speak, "okay". i spoke this one word nervously and sarcastically in a regular tone, meaning i didn't shout or whisper. it was in a way mocking the event i just witnessed. it was "okay" aliens are real. it was "okay" i saw you, you saw me... now what. it was "okay" i'm going back in the house now. it was an "okay" with multiple meanings, i have to admit it... i was scared.
  i walked back to the house a little faster than my normal gait. i did not look back to see if i could see anything from a different angle. and i did not go out again that night. 
  since then i still go out at night to smoke, etc. nowadays however, i make a point to look directly above my head before looking in any other direction. and i have a camera standing by. i hope i don't need to use it. if this happens again it would mean it was less a chance encounter and more a vested intrest in me.
content.summary: Round soft light directly above my head about 500ft. covered by a single circlular door the moment i looked up at it.

content.detailedDescription: 45 year old mother and 17 year old daughter driving 20-25 mph on quaker road about a half mile out of chappaqua witnessed bright light on treetops to the right of the tree lined road, then watched it pass directly over the car and road and disappear at treetop level on the left side of the road.  we had the windows open at the time, and the radio was off.  we weren't talking and watched it in stunned silence. then we did lots of talking after it disappeared! it made no noise, and moved very, very slowly.  the lights were bright white.  it made believers out of both of us; we were convinced it had to be a ufo.  the whole sighting took about 30 seconds.  there was no other traffic on the road, and no houses in that area to shine lights.  the craft was travelling west.  that particular area is not a flight path area, even for small planes.  i don't ever remember hearing a plane fly overhead in the ten years i lived there.  i have a sketch of it, but do not know how to upload it.  i would be happy to mail it and mufon could upload it.
content.summary: Silent, very slow moving domed saucer-like craft hovering then passing directly overhead at treetop level.

content.detailedDescription: We were sitting out side on the july 4th 2011 when we saw the ufo i yelled to my friend who was in the house to bring out the camera. he filmed the tail end of it when the second ufo appeared.
content.summary: It looked redish orange

content.detailedDescription:
The evening of march 24th, in chandler arizona, both my husband and i saw numerous orange-red lights (glowing orbs) traveling in the same general direction/path as each other heading south-east, one after another like planes on a flight path.  they definitely were not planes, or helicopters (no noise or blinking or flashing lights), and they just kept coming. my husband had time to call me to come and for me to find my shoes and go out to our front yard to watch.  i saw 5, but he saw more. 
 
it was around 9:30 to 10:00 pm and my husband had been outside to check on our septic tank which has been giving us problems.  he happened to look in the sky, since we and our kids have been watching the two planets lately, and he saw a number of orange lights "flying" - coming from the north and heading south-east.  we have lived in the same location 17 years and know the flight paths of the planes - this was not one of them.  he thought it was odd since their color was also not like an airplane's lights, and they weren't really close to one another, but he could tell they were all similar, one after another.  he watched for a while (possibly a few minutes) and then came into the house to get me.  when i had located my shoes, and came outside, looking north i immediately saw one of the orange-red lights since it was pretty bright, but he directed me to look east, where there were 4 more moving south.  they were individual lights - not all part of one object, and they seemed far away to me, although my husband thought they were like the height of what a helicopter would be.  i could tell they weren't traveling extremely fast, since i watched for a few minutes and the last one (which was the first one i had noticed to the north) could still be seen.  they also were not directly overhead, as we had to look east to see them.  my husband expected more to come from the north, since he had already seen so many, one after another, but there were no more - he didn't keep count of how many he saw.  i myself saw 5 in total, and thought they were almost a pink color, although my husband decribed them as orange - and they were not flashing on and off and there were no other colors of light.  i thought perhaps they were some military aircraft or something, but it was out of the ordinary and we didn't hear any sound from an aircraft.  i wanted my husband to video tape them or take a photo, but he didn't.  later, after he looked up on the internet and saw that other people have seen similar things, he wished he had.   
 
each of the lights or glowing orbs were round in shape, and from where we could see them, were about as large or a little larger as the largest star or planet in the sky - it was a clear night.  each was an orange-red color, and quite bright.  we couldn't see anything else of them except the glowing roundness.  they were all on the same "flight path" - one after another but we could tell they weren't part of the same "craft", they were individual "crafts", and weren't exactly in line, but were pretty close to being in line.  there were quite a few of them - maybe 20 or more - but by the time i saw them 5 could still be seen and there were no more coming from the north.
 
relative size - each light was about two or three handwidths away from the next light,  and each light was about the width of one of my fingers, maybe 1/2 an inch.  they seemed far away, and we could only see the lights, not the objects so i have no idea what the actual size was.
 
it was not natural like a star or planet - they were definately air "craft" of some sort, although since we only saw the lights of them that is just an assumption, moving across the sky not overly fast, but at a good speed.  they just "flew" until we could see them no longer in the distance.

both of us have been checking the skies in the evening to see if we see something similar again - but not as of yet.  we have never seen anything like it.

since ufo stands for unidentified flying object that does describe what these were, however that doesn't mean i think they were "alien" (from another planet).  i do believe that many of the undentified things and happenings in this world could be spiritual beings, or "principalities" manifesting themselves, that the bible talks about.  we normally only see the physical things - but there are other "dimensions"  to life.  the comforting thing is knowing that god is in control and he has already told us how things will end up - for those who trust in his son, and for those who don't.
content.summary: 10+ orange-red lights (orbs) traveled same direction/path as ea other headed se, 1 after another like planes on a flight path-they were not planes, or copters (no noise), they just kept appearing for 10+ min.

content.detailedDescription: We were in a wooded east of gilroy in an open parking lot where hikers and horse back riders can park. it was approx. around 11:30 to midnight and the date i am not sure of being that it was about 10 years ago. we were standing out side of our car. i was with two other friends who were with me. the night was extremely odd and we were standing outside the car in amazement of the sky being an odd bright blood red coming from one directtion of the tree line. it looked like maybe a fire on the other side of the mountain or maybe how big factory lights look that light up the sky but more red than orange. we would come hang out at this spot a few times a week and were very familiar with the area and this was very out of place.About fifteen minutes being there and hanging out amazed by how red the sky was, an extemely huge object flew from tree line in front of us to treeline over head and consumed most of the open sky. huge craft, circular but not smooth and was completely silent. it was moving about the speed of an aircraft that would be approaching a runway. the tree line obstructed most of surrounding are view except the brief time that it was overhead and clear of tree obstruction due to dirt parking lot. the objest had white lights in no pattern it seemed on the bottom side of craft and were not blinking. i remember standing in awe and slightly nervous about what i just saw and at the same exact time one of the people i was with said oh my god. and we really were frozen for a bit in shock. we really felt the urge to leave and got out of there just talking to each other in pure shock. we continued going up there after the event for quitwe some time and never have seen the sky the way it was that night and never seen anything like what we saw that night ever again.
content.summary: In wooded area with friends outside of cars. extremely huge object overhead passed over silently.

content.detailedDescription: We were in a wooded east of gilroy in an open parking lot where hikers and horse back riders can park. it was approx. around 11:30 to midnight and the date i am not sure of being that it was about 10 years ago. we were standing out side of our car. i was with two other friends who were with me. the night was extremely odd and we were standing outside the car in amazement of the sky being an odd bright blood red coming from one directtion of the tree line. it looked like maybe a fire on the other side of the mountain or maybe how big factory lights look that light up the sky but more red than orange. we would come hang out at this spot a few times a week and were very familiar with the area and this was very out of place.About fifteen minutes being there and hanging out amazed by how red the sky was, an extemely huge object flew from tree line in front of us to treeline over head and consumed most of the open sky. huge craft, circular but not smooth and was completely silent. it was moving about the speed of an aircraft that would be approaching a runway. the tree line obstructed most of surrounding are view except the brief time that it was overhead and clear of tree obstruction due to dirt parking lot. the objest had white lights in no pattern it seemed on the bottom side of craft and were not blinking. i remember standing in awe and slightly nervous about what i just saw and at the same exact time one of the people i was with said oh my god. and we really were frozen for a bit in shock. we really felt the urge to leave and got out of there just talking to each other in pure shock. we continued going up there after the event for quitwe some time and never have seen the sky the way it was that night and never seen anything like what we saw that night ever again.
content.summary: In wooded area with friends outside of cars. extremely huge object overhead passed over silently.

content.detailedDescription:
Me and my mothers boyfriend and two other friends were looking up at the sky where one of us seen what we thought was a shooting star it was starlike and moving very fast across the sky.  but it stopped paused, changed direction then shot across the sky. stopped again and disappeared.  we were all looking for it again up directly above us when i found it again we all screamed found it again but when i looked at my friend they were looking left i was looking right there was more of them.  they would shoot across the stop abd change direction like 45 degree angles. two of them stopped right in front of each other and two more came out. they were all round and a colored light greenish was circling the perimeter around all of them. then they all disappeared at once.  

look i know this isnt going to blow minds or make the news but i been waiting over 27 years just to tell someone that wouldnt laugh and can appreciate it. i would have never ever believed in ufo at all until i seen it with my own two eyes what i saw. i wish i had a camera or cell phones invented back then. i am willing to take a lie detector or hypnosis anything.  but if anyone in your group is a non believer they are wrong. planes dont speed across the sky and from an estimate 12 feet of sky from my view in less than a second  and come to a complete stop then shoot off in a 45 degree angle. not sure what the actual distance is but no plane flies that fast. 

just needed to get this off my chest and its been a secret eating at me forever. 

if anyone read this letter thank you for reading it. thank you for your understanding
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Seen 4 star like objects in the sky moving fast stopping changing direction

content.detailedDescription: I was on a jog (i like to take my jogs late at night) in garden hill ontario. i was selecting some tunes on my ipod and when i looked back at the road i saw a light in the distance. i figured it was just a light as it looked to be  at a regular height for a street light. it was far in the distance above a private airport which doesn't get any use after it gets dark. it was 11:45 p.M. the light then began to slowly raise up over the airport, the airport had no lights on. after about 10 minutes of it raising up i turned to make sure no cars were on the road behind me, when i turned back it was completely gone. 2 mins. later 3 helicopters flew by the area where the object was. they were fairly high up. after these 3 choppers i saw no more aircrafts in the sky for half an hour.
content.summary: Bright glowing orange light, hovered then dissapeared

content.detailedDescription:
Me and two friends were walking home one evening in june 1958 i was about 15 years old. i saw the highway pavement light up and i though a car was coming so i looked up and saw it. i froze and my girl friend stopped with me. my friend had been playing a transistor radio and it stopped working so he was walking backwards trying to get the station back on. i yelled earl! to get him to stop before he ran into the object. i soon as i yelled his name the object went dark and disappeared. the object was about the size of a gravel dump truck it was a lens shape and on the edge of the object you could see what appeared to be gear teeth the appeared to be spinning around the object.
the bottom of the object was brightly lit but did not seem to have and central source but rather it was like the whole bottom was the light source
the light was soft like florescent but was very bright it was reflecting of the highway pavement and  the top of the disk was dimly lit i think from the light reflection. it was totally silent it hovered about 4 or 5 feet off the road and appeared interested in the pavement and it seemed it was unaware of our presents until i called out, then it disappeared.

i never reported this because we were just kids and felt no one would believe us.
content.summary: Lens shape disk hovered above highway bottom of disk lit up the highway .

content.detailedDescription: My story start's back 27 yrs ago when i was a young boy walking down our drive way to catch the buss for school. as i was walking i had a feeling something wasn't right. i looked to my left and saw an abject, or i should say a very bright light coming from the end of a blueberry field. i saw it once and then again about a 100 ft down the driveway. i had know idea what i was looking at at the time. the strange thing about looking at it the second time was the fact i have no memory of walking that 100ft. it was as if i was in 1 place and then another. the object looked like a very bright white ball with a blue light at its top moving counter clock wise and a green light at its bottom moving clock wise. i stared at it for a few more minutes and then it glowed brightly and was gone. this took place in the winter. by summer when the grass started growing, i remember the place where i saw the object, the grass didn't start to grow back for 5 or 6 years. all traces of the spot are gone now. i've only toiled 1 other person of what i saw and it was my mom. but i didn't tell her until i was in my late 20's. i've always wanted to tell someone else but people would have said i was nuts. the only thing i have to remember that day is a strange round mark on my right ankle. it never hurt and my mom said she never remembered me doing anything as a kid for that mark tobe there. i don't know if i was lucky to see it or in the right place at the right time. i feel a great sense of relief tell my story. it's hard to carry something like this for so long and not have a place or others to tell. all i can say is we aren't alone.
content.summary: A big bright light and 2 smaller lights.

content.detailedDescription: It was afternoon time i was at my friends house whom i was living with at the time, when we decided to ride our bikes 6 houses down to our other friends house . we exited the  house out the back and got on our bikes. then we proceeded to ride down the street with me in the lead .The house opposite to his had a big trees in the front yard ,as we past the trees to our left and continued riding i caught something out of the corner of my eye and did a double take .Immediately i slammed on the brakes as fast as i could which caused my friend who was behind me to do the same .I said ricky  what the f@#k is that and a reflective disk shape object was floating over the houses kind of like it was riding along side us ,about 500 to 1000 ft in the air. as we were looking it continued on for another couple of seconds then stopped, it did not make a sound. the object continued to sit there ,we were speechless cause we both knew what we were looking at was not any conventional air craft we know to exist. and it was a bright sunny day not a cloud in the sky .Then after 5 to 10 seconds the object started heading back the way it came with out turning and from a stand still.It started off very slowly moving back the way it came but picked up speed as it went . while we continued looking at this thing in amazement i realized that i would lose sight be hind the trees we had just passed i jumped back on my bike as fast as i could and rode up the street after it. i wanted to try and see it as long as i could, but as it came to where i would loose it behind the trees the thing literally took off like a bullet and was gone . well me and my friend could not believe what we just saw and sat there in awe for a minute .But knowing there was nothing else we could do we got back on our bikes and continued to our friends house. we told her and every one we saw for days to a week but you can only so many people. i would of reported it then but i was 17 and did not know who to tell and figured no one would believe us any way. but as i watch the investigations on tv i see there are lie detector test and other things that will lend credence to my story .And i am willing to do whatever i have to to prove my story. i am sure my friend will do the same. i don't know what it was i saw ,but i know what i saw .Something strange is happening .
content.flightPath: Stationary,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 25 words just do not do the event justice.

content.detailedDescription: That day, i had stayed out of school and watched tv in my bedroom all day.  my parents came home, we had supper and went to bed.  i was laying in bed watching tv when my tv just went off.  at first, i thought that i had rolled over on the remote.  i found the remote and tried to turn the tv back on and it would not come on.  i then thought that the batteries were dead or weak in the remote, and i started feeling a little like someone was "pranking" me.  i got up and walked over to the tv and pressed the power button and nothing happened.  there were red lights on my tv and stereo to show they were receiving power so i knew they weren't unplugged.  at this point, i started to really have a feeling as if someone was "pranking" me.  i reached over and tried to turn on the stereo by pressing the power button and, again, nothing happened.  that's when i started to get a really eery feeling that someone was watching me and i got chill bumps.  i felt that i needed to look out the window that looks out to the next door neighbors' house.  i went over to the window and rolled open the blinds so that i could see out.  as soon as the blinds opened enough for me to see through them, i saw the object.  it was disc shaped with multi-colored lights around the rim and they were blinking.  the object was hovering near the back corner of my house and was probably about 20-30 feet off the ground.  as soon as i got a glimpse of the object, it took off straight up in the air.  i pulled the blinds up so that i could follow it in the sky.  by the time i got the blinds up so that i could see up in the sky, the object was very small in the sky and then quickly dissapeared.  i stood there for a minute in shock trying to make sense out what had happened.  i then went straight over to the tv and pressed the power button and the tv came on with no problem.  at that point, i knew something very surreal had taken place.  i thought to myself that i must be dreaming.  to test that theory, i wrote a note to my mother telling her that if she got the note to wake me up because i had seen a ufo.  my mother woke me up the next morning asking "what is this about you seeing a ufo?".  i knew at that point that what i saw was no dream.  it was very real.  i've told about 20 people that were the closest to me about the sighting.  based on the reaction that i've gotten, i kind of tried to just forget about it.  i have never, though, not even for a second thought that what i saw was not real.  i know what i saw was real and it definately left a lasting impression in my mind.
content.summary: Disk-shaped flying object with multi-colored blinking lights outside my bedroom window

content.detailedDescription: Inow im 40was coming back to the boys camp i was in. it was about eleven at night and there was about six of us coming back from a weekly meeting in santa maria. the boys camp is behind santa barbara in the los prietos national forest, right near red rock. i was sitting in the back of a station wagon just talking to the other guys and about half way back to the camp, on a twisting highway near lake cachuma, i looked out the back window and noticed an object overhead. i couldnt believe what i saw. above us was a large triangle object with a big, round, white light at each point. i told everyone to look and they saw it too. we slowed down to look at it and we watched it hover for about 2 or 3 minutes and then it just shot away from us at an incredible speed. nobody relly talked about what we saw. manny ernst was the driver and my camp counselor. he saw it as clear as i did and he thought it might be something from vandenberg air force base but was still unsure. my camp # was 4742. mr. ernst is the only person i remember the name of. now im 40 years old and i have thought about this for years and have been seeing alot of what i saw on television lately. i know now that what i saw was not a conventional craft, but when i was 15 i didnt give it as much thought. i have never told anyone else up until now.
content.summary: Was in back of car,looked up and saw a triangle shaped craft with round lights at each point. was silent and after a couple of minutes the object sped away very fast.

content.detailedDescription:
I was at my dad's deer camp in texas.  he & i were standing around talking.  

the appearance of the 4 bright red-orange lights in the sky.

i am not sure,  my first thought were flares.

there were 4 lights that appeared simultaneously in a vertical formation.  the second time the lights appeared,  they appeared horizontally but sequentially.  

disbelief and  curiosity.

they faded out.
content.summary: 4 glowing lights appeared in the sky two different times within 10 minutes.

content.detailedDescription:
3-26-12
9:00 pm.

i was heading east on hillsborough ave @ 50th st. in tampa.
i noticed a strange red orb/light in the sky. the orb was 
approx 300 ft. high and heading from the nw to the se. very 
slightly pulsating and about the speed of a helicopter watching 
traffic.

i watched this object thru the entire stop light cycle as 
it is a triggered light. this is when i took the pics (total
of 3). 

when the traffic light changed i pulled into a driveway and 
got out of my car. i pointed my green laser well in front of 
the orb - it immediately slowed down. as i was switching my 
camera to video it started pulsating faster and started 
dimming at the same time until i could no longer see it.

the sighting lasted about 3 full minutes. 

the sky was nice and clear.

the white dot just to the right and above the orb is jupiter.
content.summary: Red orb in tampa, fl. hills ave and 50th st. reacted to laser

content.detailedDescription: Jet from sjafb was seen flying at a high rate of speed from south to north.Jet appeared to pull up and a green streak of light gained on the jet very quickly. once it caught up with the jet it turned into a ball of white light or it was some type of spotlight from the plane. both appeared to leave the area quickly.
content.summary: Appeared to be like a green flare of some type that followed a sjafb jet

content.detailedDescription: ...For several months reports of ufo's were abundant in our area of mid state new york, known as the lower hudson valley. just weeks prior to this "happening" reports were generated to the east fishkill police dept. my brother in law was visiting and i was explaining to him what we had been experiencing. i took him into our back yard just after sunset and pointed out those "lights" in the sky that appear to be communicating through " different colored blinking lights". he immediately agreed it appeared to be as i suggested a form of communications. i believe in was somewhere between 8:30 and 9:00 pm. we joked, kidded about the sightings, and then i suggested half jokingly "why not try to make contact ?"....I did. the main unit began a rapid descent, it seem to be on a direct line above our position, it came to a "halt" and from the center of the unit a "light" dropped. to my amazement after 3 or 5 possible seconds a second light sprung out of the initial one and again in a period of 3 to 5 seconds a third light came forth completely surrounding us. it was "quiet","warm", "safe", "soft", unlike any light i have ever experienced or seen before or since. i never felt fear but rather a sense of security. time was "lost". i can't explain.It was about 11:30 when my wife standing on the top step from the garage back door asked "when are you two coming in ?"...Neither of us had any idea of where the time went. the entire "known" is what i stated and how more then 15 minutes to a 1/2 hour had passed i can't explain. my brother in law was frighten by it, still does not want to discuss it. it's been years now. i've already died once of a "heart attack" and just need to convey this "happening". i have absolutely no doubt that i was correct in my thought, that we could and can make contact with this "unit". it has a level of intelligence beyond anything we can imagine. the "tracking" unit is sensitive to voice and actually can detect one from "space". the "light" i will never forget, i could feel it. everything i'm relating here is true. i've talked about it from time to time and still don't fully understand "why" it all happened. i'm into my 60's now and i want "others" to know, they aren't alone. i don't know why, us.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: A telescopic light descended in at least 3 tubes covering myself and brother-in-law

content.detailedDescription: 1 i was at california exposition harness race track, i was playing football with my friends when we saw the light in sky, so we quit playing and went to get  food and tons of people were in aww when they were looking at the object and then the driver of the start car said have you guy seen the light in the sky, then we looked upp and saw it so we went back to the field to video tape it and then the driver said that the driver and co-piolet of the ambulance were observing it through the window of the ambulance. when i noticed the object it was pulsating the colors pink,blue and in the center white. when i noticed it i thought it was a helicopter but then i realized that it had pink and blue lights which helicopters dont have. the object was stationary when i first saw it then it slowly moved up and down and stopped and did it again. i was completely blown away with what it was. i lost sight of it when it just very slowly disappered in about 10 minutes after i stopped recording and i started recording about 12-15 minutes after it appered.
content.summary: Stationary pulsating light in the sky

content.detailedDescription:
I reported a sighting in early january at the same location, i've actually relocated into the house of the first sighting. during this time and now i've seen the same triangle-shaped objects as well as these star-like floaters. 
in this particular case, i remained calm and actually had my wife and daughter come outside to witness what i was hearing, as well as to show her the different constellations and to hear her opinion on the crescent moon and the various stars which are brighter tonight than usual..
as well the sound i was hearing, was very strange; but i attributed to some organic animal, such as a frog or something that makes a strange humming or almost instrumental groan.
during this time, she noticed a star moving (not very uncommon leading up to this point.. as we have noticed these things almost every night.)
it was hovering, very fast & very high. we knew this wasn't an optical illusion as we watched it pass between other stars in the sky, and went under the brightest star beside the moon, it descended & flew in a left-ward direction until it went beyond our sight. i stood on the porch straining to see it, but it had vanished beyond sigh completely. i later noticed a single nimbus cloud, the only cloud in the visible night sky.. i'm not completely sure, what this was .. it was too high to be so large and bright, so i personally ruled out satellites or airplanes, because at that height there would be a typical sound boom or trail of noise in the sky, similar to thunder.. also, i tried to focus on the star and nothing else, so the lights reflective from the other stars wouldn't disrupt my vision. (after a brief duration exposure to light in the night sky can usually "blind" a person to see beyond a certain distance). that is all the information i can provide, it's simple and not very elaborate, but this is the best description i can assert without exaggerating.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: It appeared as a bright star , it appeared white and a reddish orange.

content.detailedDescription:
My son was in the backyard and said come, so i ran out and there were silver shiny objects seemed to be falling from the sky. then i realized they were moving sideways and came all together then after an hour they all seemed to disappear. i wanted to call the tv news. i didnt have a camera. my son, 24 said maybe a sattlelight exploded and they were fragments. the best way i can explain would be how foil has two side, one shiny and one not so shiny. as they slowly moved they went from shiny to not so shiny. they had a orb of light around them. like stars out in broad daylight! i called my husband at work and told him, i had to tell someone! and went on the net to see who else saw this today and ran across your web site. i am fifty and have never seen anything this cool in my whole life. i do not know if it was government or what. something crazy is going on, like right out of a movie! i wanted them to be something falling so i could get closer and see what they were. they were not moving fast....Seemed to hover and not care if we saw them! i just wonder if anyone else in chandler happened to be looking up at this time and noticed what we saw? we have not been able to sleep, my husband son and i for a couple of weeks and i do allot of spiritual stuff with the bible and the end times.....So i know kinda what is going on in the world with all the sounds and stuff, but this was crazy! thank you for letting me share this weird experience.

[name deleted/cms/tg]
content.summary: Looked like foil falling from the sky moved slowly about 30 of them or more some closer than others  they disapeared slowly  after an hour they where all gone  they wanted us to see them like they were putting on a show  strangest thing i have ever seen!

content.detailedDescription: I was outside of my apartment building at 9:05pm, i did not notice anything immediately. i then caught the two objects floating at approximately 280* from where i was standing. the objects floated along together moving to my left. at first i was trying to figure out where the airport was thinking they may have been planes that recently took off, but i did think they were in the direction of the airport. this is when i realized that these red-orange objects were glowing, and did not have any other lights blinking on them to indicate that they were aircraft. i then received a call from one of my classmates who was out at tim horton's getting a coffee, and he also saw the objects. i had been standing outside less than 4 minutes when he had called, and we stayed on the phone for a few minutes discussing what we were seeing and how strange it was. the orb on the left then started moving away at a high rate of speed, it disappeared from sight completely within 15 seconds. the second orb (which was on the left) began to move away within 30 seconds of the first orb disappearing, and it disappeared in a similar amount of time, and this was at 9:12pm. i consider myself a man of science and i have no other way of rationalizing what i saw. i was pretty stunned after seeing it and was pretty excited about it. i then took the reading on my iphone of where i started seeing the object (280*) to when i saw the object fly away, 310*
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: 2 glowing orbs, floating like a candle in a balloon, which then seemed to fly away at incredible speed.

content.detailedDescription: After observing the ufo above my power plant for about 5 min it took off without any noise. i contacted the search radar people and they tracked it estimated speed 24,000 mph with in earths atmosphere.
content.summary: I was on a early warning radar site 150 miles north of san fransisco i was contacted by mcc radar section, went out side of my power plant and observed it hoverinfg above my gas turbine power plane

content.detailedDescription: 2 sets of objects,in distance in pinebarrens,seem 2 comunicate with eachother by blinking,apear 2 be about 7 to 10 on 2 sides of sky,no shpe to see,to far but move rapidly and jumping around
content.summary: Lights,2 sets of objects,seem 2 singnal back and forth,then seeming 2 go from sky 2 horizone in the blink of an eye

content.detailedDescription:
I was outside about 11 pm walking my dog.  he started to bark and i just thought maybe it was a deer.  i then preceeded to take him in.

i was inside for a good 3 minutes before i realized that i needed to get something out of my mothers car that i left in it.  as i go outside, i am quite afraid of the dark and the night sky because of what might be up in the sky.  i happened to glance up and see a clear night with stars and a moon.. but out of my right eye, i saw something weird.. i looked up over the underground pentegon which is supposed to be this secret base hidden whith in a mountain side across the street from me.  

i saw this light.  at first i thought its just an airplaine or something because we are near dullas and bwi.  i then also thought it might be a helecopter or a jet because of the president being at camp david.

then i noticed something different.  i used to watch alot of alien movies like close encounters by spielberg.  

what i noticed was a light blinking.. it was whitish orange.. then it would flicker on and off much like what you would see on an airplaine wing.. but then after it flickered.. i saw some other lights flicker that resembled what looked like a frisby shaped round object.  

i was in shock... it looked like it was big... but i coudent tell because of the distance between me and the object.  

the lights then flickered in a wave like pattern like blink... then the wave.. one will blink then the wave.. and it would hover over the mountain.. 

i counted what i saw to be about 12-15 lights in a circle.  it was not flat.. it was on an angle.  

the lights lasted for about a good 3 to 4 minutes before i saw it move.. it slowly moved hovering at a slow speed which is not normal for an aircraft because it would crash.  

it was moving towards camp david which was south east of the underground pentegon.  i do not know if i was the only one who saw this but i know it was not normal.

we do get alot of low flying appachae helecopters in this area alot due to the nature of the secret government areas.

i tried to record it but my cellphone was dead. it was half full but then i noticed it was dead.  when i went inside.. my mother said the power flickered on and off for a few seconds as well which was during the time i saw the moving object.  

i have kept this to myself and told no one but i am now reporting it because i am watching your show on planet green realizing i need to let this story be heard.

my biggest fear is of an abduction by a ufo.  when i saw this.. my enitial reaction was i was scared.. afraid.. and did not know what to do..

i lost site of the object as it disapeared over the mountains towards camp david.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: During the time obama was visiting camp david for v8 summit.  over site r, i saw what looked like a craft or maybe a few.

content.detailedDescription:
Walking dog just prior to sunrise, noticed bright light due east outside of normal flight paths.  initial observation suggested star or planet (was in same location of planetary conjunction event the night before), however while observing track of object determined it was tracking directly toward my position at probably the speed of a helicopter.  once it reached apogee over me, could make out a square arrangement of lights two in front and two in back with an obvious reflection of the sun on the main body.  at apogee the craft turned smoothly due north and sighting was lost, it simply faded out.

am a retired navy man with extensive observation skills and to this date have never observed something such as this.
content.summary: Unknown aircraft flying outside of traditional corridors

content.detailedDescription: I went outside to walk my girlfriend to her car. i stopped and looked at the moon and the 2 planets near it. when i noticed a dim light getting brighter and brighter. it looked like a fireball, but it didn't land, it was flying in a straight line opposite of the usual flight paths, because i live near the ontario airport. i went inside for 10 minutes, grabbed my cellphone and went back outside. that's when i saw the second one. i tried to take pictures, but none of the pictures came out. i did get video. i reported yesterday to another and tried on this site but it would not submit
content.summary: 2 bright orange lights moving slowly towards the east

content.detailedDescription: Nice warm sunny day clear blue skys was watching planes go by then saw star like obgect it hoverd for a few mins the started to acend up and out of sight.
content.summary: Star like ufo

content.detailedDescription: Nice warm sunny day clear blue skys was watching planes go by then saw star like obgect it hoverd for a few mins the started to acend up and out of sight.
content.summary: Star like ufo

content.detailedDescription: The object was in the southern sky about 2 fists above the horizon and 250 degrees off the woodstown vor ( ood ) . the altitude was around 8000 -10000 feet. the object was in a hoover mode for around 1 hr then slowly moved further south and climbed to a higher ukn altitude. on sunday 3-25-12 around 10:30 pm the object appeared in the same spot and had the same flight pattern. while oberving this object a large aircraft was just below the object mentioned above had the " usual " aircraft nav lights on it as it moved across the night sky. the object did not change its hoover mode during the other aricraft passing. the object would only flash the colors light blue, light green, and red in its shape. on 3-25-12 the millville flight services was called around 10:45 to report this matter. there was no further calls or reports from them as of the following day. on 3-26-12 i will try of obtain photos of this object to provide further information.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Looked like a circle of red, green, and white light
